nhc_headline: ...CENTER OF MILTON PULLING AWAY FROM THE EAST COAST OF FLORIDA... ...STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND HEAVY RAINFALL STILL OCCURRING NEAR THE  SPACE COAST...
summary:
...CENTER OF MILTON PULLING AWAY FROM THE EAST COAST OF FLORIDA... ...STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND HEAVY RAINFALL STILL OCCURRING NEAR THE  SPACE COAST...
 As of 8:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 10
 the center of Milton was located near 28.9, -79.5
 with movement ENE at 18 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 980 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.
